QuestData.Title: Return to Raene
QuestData.Description: I suggest you find Raene and let her know the rod is finished. I'm sure she'll know what your next course should be.$B$BBe careful... I sense a great deal of power within it for both good and ill. I hope that you and Raene know what you are doing.$B$BGood luck, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Dartol's Rod to Raene Wolfrunner at Astranaar in Ashenvale.
QuestData.RewardText: You've recreated the rod Teronis had set out to find? That's wonderful to hear.$B$BShael'dryn has been indispensible in her assistance. Teronis would be proud to see his quest is continuing even after his tragic passing.$B$B<Raene looks over the reconstructed rod with a look of approval and thoughts racing behind her eyes.>$B$BNow it is time for us to make use of its power to eliminate the enemies of Ashenvale!
